QuestData.Title: The Hidden Clutch
QuestData.Description: With the major black dragons out of the Badlands, it is now safe to move the egg again. You will find me on a small plateau, north of New Kargath.$b$bCome and find me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rhea at The Hidden Clutch in the Badlands.
QuestData.RewardText: The egg must always be moving. We are not safe anywhere.$b$bDeathwing, even in his madness, knows all the hidden places in this world. The egg must not rest.
